timeline.bodyText:
Please add a comment somewhere that this field is only updated in Elasticsearch via the updateRevised script defined at the top, is never de-serialized (so if one looks at a Revision instance, it will not contain the revised branch+timestamp pairs) and is used in ES search expressions only.
I got a bit confused when I saw that the setter could be removed, Jackson is only using the field when converting to JSON, it is always initialized with an empty list and no one is interested in the contents in Java either 😃
timeline.author: apeteri
